info.title: Sample Implicit Flow OAuth2 Project
info.description: This is an example of using OAuth2 Implicit Flow in a specification to describe security to your API.

get.summary: Returns user detail for dashboard, basic information, name, surname, atc. | Use in WF: U1, AU2
Returns the user notification list. (dynamic filter) | Use in WF: Global menu
Returns the user account list. | Use in WF: U1, U2, AU2, AU3.1, AU4.1, AU4.1.1, AU4.1.2, AU4.1.3

Request to transfer cash to an account. | Use in WF: U1

parameters.name: products
parameters.description: String value can be list of product's ids separated by commastring. For example: "9023,9024".

type.description: 1 = Benefit; 2 = E-Meal vouchers; 3 = Cash card; 4 = Benefit + E-Meal card; 5 = Alive
1 = Buying a Benefit; 2 = Import points; 3 = Cash; 4 = Non-Conventional Authorization; 5 = Points conversion; 6 = Postage
1 - Ordinary message (contact, ..); 2 - Payment issue; 3 - Problem when ordering

day_of_week.description: 0 - Sunday, 1 - Monday, 2 - Tuesday, 3 - Wednesday, 4 - Thursday, 5 - Friday, 6 - Saturday
